00008 #include "../fileio/CTileLoader.h"

00015 CTilemap::CTilemap() :
00016 m_Tilesurface(NULL),
00017 m_EmptyBackgroundTile(143),
00018 m_numtiles(0),
00019 m_pbasesize(0),
00020 m_column(0)
00021 { }
00022 
00023 bool CTilemap::CreateSurface(SDL_Color *Palette, Uint32 Flags,
00024     Uint16 numtiles, Uint16 pbasesize, Uint16 column)
00025 {
00026  m_numtiles = numtiles;
00027  m_pbasesize = pbasesize;
00028  m_column = column;
00029  m_Tilesurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(Flags, m_column<<m_pbasesize,
00030           (m_numtiles/m_column)<<m_pbasesize, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00031  SDL_SetColors(m_Tilesurface, Palette, 0, 255);
00032  SDL_SetColorKey(m_Tilesurface, SDL_SRCCOLORKEY, COLORKEY);
00033  
00034  return ( m_Tilesurface != NULL );
00035 }
00036 
00037 bool CTilemap::loadHiresTile( const std::string& filename )
00038 {
00039  if(!IsFileAvailable(filename))
00040   return false;
00041 
00042  if(m_Tilesurface)
00043  {
00044   SDL_Surface *temp_surface = SDL_LoadBMP(GetFullFileName(filename).c_str());
00045   if(temp_surface)
00046   {
00047    SDL_FreeSurface(m_Tilesurface);
00048    m_Tilesurface = temp_surface;
00049    return true;
00050   }
00051  }
00052  
00053  return false;
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool CTilemap::optimizeSurface()
00057 {
00058  if(g_pVideoDriver->getFiltermode() == 1 && g_pVideoDriver->isOpenGL()
00059    )
00060   return true;
00061 
00062  if(m_Tilesurface)
00063  {
00064   SDL_Surface *temp_surface;
00065   temp_surface = SDL_DisplayFormatAlpha(m_Tilesurface);
00066   SDL_FreeSurface(m_Tilesurface);
00067   m_Tilesurface = temp_surface;
00068   return true;
00069  }
00070  else
00071   return false;
00072 }

00074 ///////////////////////////////////
00075 ///// Initialization Routines /////
00076 ///////////////////////////////////
00077 SDL_Surface *CTilemap::getSDLSurface()
00078 {
00079  return m_Tilesurface;
00080 }
00081 
00082 ////////////////////////////
00083 ///// Drawing Routines /////
00084 ////////////////////////////
00085 
00086 void CTilemap::drawTile(SDL_Surface *dst, Uint16 x, Uint16 y, Uint16 t)
00087 {
00088  SDL_Rect src_rect, dst_rect;
00089  src_rect.x = (t%m_column)<<m_pbasesize;
00090  src_rect.y = (t/m_column)<<m_pbasesize;
00091  src_rect.w = src_rect.h = dst_rect.w = dst_rect.h = 1<<m_pbasesize;
00092  dst_rect.x = x;  dst_rect.y = y;
00093  
00094  SDL_BlitSurface(m_Tilesurface, &src_rect, dst, &dst_rect);
00095 }
00096 
00097 CTilemap::~CTilemap() {
00098  if(m_Tilesurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_Tilesurface);
00099 }
